text: Terence Caldwell (born 5 December 1938) is an English former professional footballer who made nearly 400 appearances in the Football League playing as a defender for Huddersfield Town, Leeds United, Carlisle United and Barrow. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Wakefield Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Leeds United F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Barrow A.F.C. players Category:Wakefield F.C. players
title: Terry Caldwell
